title: 13 month old healthy unaltered male Ragdoll
desc: Severus born 02/17/17 Male TICA Registered unaltered with breeding rights . Very healthy a
content: Severus born 02/17/17 Male TICA Registered unaltered with breeding rights . Very healthy and had his yearly exam today March 12. All his major health records, HCM testing, and color coat testing are included in the pics. Also included are pics of his kittens. Proven breeder times 3 litters. fHe loves to be held.  HCM negative, FEV FIV negative and current on all shots and worming, current color tested, current vet records. Email address is Email Me Here text to 717-503-1779. Name is Allyson Judy if you purchase you can also use a  stud for hire to sire more kittens and make money that way as well. I have been asked why I am selling him.  I have a blue mink male and do not need two mink males.  The blue mink carries both so he’s the more desirable sire to have for me.  Price is firm.  Has been reduced won’t reduce again.  I have 10 months to sell. Not in a hurry

title: 6 week old male Ragdoll kitten
desc: 6 week old male bi color Ragdoll kitten for adoption. Born in a litter of six he is the la
content:
6 week old male bi color Ragdoll kitten for adoption. Born in a litter of six he is the last kitten in the litter to be adopted. Mom is an unregistered seal point, dad is a TICA registered seal mink bi color. He is socialized, loving, snuggly and precious. He will come with the following:

1. Veterinarian appt on March 23, which the vet will check fecal for worms, worm kittens, first shots given by vet, complete health exam, first dose of advantage flea and tick

2. 30 day health guarantee for any communicable diseases

3. One year guarantee for genetic disorder

4. Parental health records as well as their HCM results

6. Gift bag with gallon bag of dry food, six cans of grain free wet food, collar, toys, brush, wipes, snacks

6. Unlimited contact with me for any and all questions you may have.

Price is firm. Deposit to be refunded upon proof of neuter is 100.00 all of which will be in the contract. I can provide references and vet information

Kitten will see vet on Friday March 23 at 10:30 am.  After that as long as he’s healthy he is ready for pick up. Both parents here on site and all vet records on all cats here as well. Our cats are raised in Home with 7 children, 5 adults, 3 dogs and cats and kittens. They are socialized. Cats have free run of home and are never put in cages.

Contact information is as follows
Allyson Judy
Cell phone 717-503-1779 please text before calling so I know your interested and if I can talk. Pictures include kitten, Mom, dad, and litter mates. This is not a registered kitten

title: Exquisite Ragdolls! Must see! Bright Blue Eyes! - One of the nicest litters we've ever had!!
desc: A portion of all adoption costs will be donated to one of three National Asperger Associat
content:
A portion of all adoption costs will be donated to one of three National Asperger Associations!  We raise our kitties for a reason!  We call it our gift circle.  Friendly, healthy kitties with no surprises - fully guaranteed.  And children with Autism and Aspergers benefit.

We are committed to the health of our kittens and we utilize UC Davis for our genetic DNA testing.
We have been raising kittens for 15 years and take a great deal of pride in our kittens.

Here we have one of our kittens being a real ham at the vet! (8/26/16). Everyone loved him and made such a fuss. We have plenty of other photos to show you, of our various babies in various patterns - but all having our trademark big blue round eyes and great coat :)

Kittens range from $775 to $875.

All kittens are registered, up to date on vaccinations, and come with a gift bag, as well as a custom blanket of your choice , thanking you for donating to aspergers/autism and providing our kittens a great home.

Contact us - We'd love to talk to you more about our kittens and how they are raised :) Thank you.

title: Beautiful Ragdoll Kittens - Registered
desc: A portion of a kitten adoption costs will be donated to one of three Autism / Asperger's A
content:
A portion of a kitten adoption costs will be donated to one of three Autism / Asperger's Associations

They are GORGEOUS, sweet, and very friendly kitties. We have seal lynx points available now... Seal points, blue points, blue lynx points, tortie points, etc. all possible in future litters :) Inquire Now for Priority Choice!

We have over 15 years experience raising these sweet little guys.
Their health and happiness are our top priorities. We utilize UC Davis for genetic testing on out cats.
All of our cats and kittens are FeLV, FIV, PKD negative, and parasite free.

They will come home with a strong one year health and three year genetic guarantee, up to date on vaccinations with pamphlet, and a kitten gift bag. *NEW* We have had some personalized kitty blankets made to show our appreciation for the great families that adopt our kitties :) Your choice of embroidery, based on availability.

A portion of a kitten adoption costs will be donated to one of three Autism / Asperger's Associations - Feel free to do it yourself and send us the receipt or we can donate on your behalf.

title: TICA Handsome registered male Sepia seal mitted breeder - full rights Harrisburg, Pa
desc: I live near Harrisburg, Pa.   I am selling my Sepia seal mitted male.  He was born Novembe
content:
I live near Harrisburg, Pa.  I am selling my Sepia seal mitted male.  He was born November 26, 2017 and is ready to go to his new home.  I would definitely keep him but he is related to my other females.  He is $1,900.00.  I do have his 5 generation pedigree that I would be happy to email you.

He is a pure sweetheart with a wonderful personality and drop dead gorgeous. I will have him HCM, MPS VI, Felv and FIV tested.  I will do a coat color panel as well.

He was never caged  and from day 2  held and loved by all my family.  Let me know if you have any questions.  He would make a great breeder for any cattery interested in Sepia's and Mink.

The first picture I posted is his dad Simba.  The second picture his mom and the last 2 pictures are of him.

You can also see my video and pictures on my homepage: www.aragdolltolove.com  Thanks and have a wonderful day!

Bringing you quality Ragdoll kittens from Purry Acres Cattery located in Bethlehem, PA. where Ragdolls are done right ! (healthy, happy kittens with lottsa love n kisses).

This is our other stunning male Seal Lynx Point ragdoll kitten, SAMMY. He is the smaller of this litter of 3 boys with the biggest heart of all. OMG, he's got the personality that's over the top! He is always the first to greet when you walk in the room and will follow like a little puppy. And his looks match his great personality too! His markings are amazing and he has beautiful blue eyes. He is Currently 9 weeks old and is now ready to go to his forever home approx. He is the kitten on the right in the group photo at age 6 weeks.

All kitties will come to you with age appropriate vaccinations and will be dewormed.

UCLA Davis. Additionally a contract including a health guarantee will be provided.

Kittens also come with a food sampler kit!

All of our kitties grow up in our home with a family environment making our little babies well socialized.

A deposit of $200 will reserve this little guy, deposit payments can be made via Paypal or by mailing a check or money order. Please contact us for details on reserving one of our lovely furr babies.

title: Lynx Point Bicolor Female - Breeder or Pet
desc: Anne Marie is a beautiful lynx point bicolor female Ragdoll kitten ready for her new home.
content: Anne Marie is a beautiful lynx point bicolor female Ragdoll kitten ready for her new home.  She is very loving and does the famous Ragdoll "flop" when being picked up.  She is sold up to date on her vaccinations, has been wormed, and her health is guaranteed.  My breeder cats are HCM, FeLV, and FIV neg.  Pet price is $850, but she could be used for breeding in which case the price is $1,600.  Her lines are traditional and non-traditional IRCA  Registration is in TICA.

content:
I live near Harrisburg, Pa.  I have retired breeder females, 1 retired male and older kittens.  The prices listed are for pets.  Here is what is available:

Zima  Born 2/28/13  350.00
